body.p: By default, documents are opened in the WYSIWYG modeWYSIWYG mode, which is very close to a conventional word processor.

fig.title: Serna window in the WYSIWYG mode.

body.p: The WYSIWYG mode shows a document by default without markup tags. It is possible to switch to the Markup mode where markup tags are displayed: choose View Show Markup or click the Show Markup button on the Status bar.
